item.description:
Gather at Moses Brown field Sunday to play zombie vs. non-zombie (whoever hasn't yet been infected as zombie), then walk to Thayer for foooood, then to Andy/Liz house for mooovie. brraaaaaaains...


11:00-1:30 zombie frisbee @ moses brown school
1:30-2:30 zombie walk to thayer and eating brains
3:00-6:00 28 days later @ liz/andy's house

come to any or all segments

 

 

Come join in the fun and play some ultimate frisbee! All skill levels are welcome! Don't worry if you have never played, we can teach you.  Competition is friendly and fun! Bring your friends! 

 

Make sure you wear clothes and shoes good for running because this is definitely a work out! Don't forget to bring a drink!  If you have cleats, it really helps!  Just make sure they are plastic not metal cleats.

 

There is a soccer field right across the street from the Brown University sports complex near the corner of Lloyd and Hope.  The field is inside the Moses Brown campus, but the gates are open to walk through.  

 

My number is 703-314-3380 in case you can't find us.

Might want to consider bringing spare zombie/frisbee clothing and maybe face paint, fake blood to touch up.
item.how_to_find_us: On the soccer field near the corner of Lloyd and Hope
item.name: ZOMBIE frisbee - ZOMBIE walk - ZOMBIE movie
